column1: 78;Coinbase Puts More Skin in the Crypto Game;Gerelyn Terzo;2021-08-20 19:25:59;full;https://finance.yahoo.com/news/coinbase-puts-more-skin-crypto-192559507.html;yahoo.com;Coinbase is directing USD 500 million to crypto assets on its balance sheet.;"Shares of cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase are up nearly 4% on Friday after the stakes were raised with its cash pile. CEO Brian Armstrong revealed on Twitter that Coinbase has received the green light from the board to buy more than USD 500 million in cryptocurrencies.
